title: One way ticket: a film about the abuse of drugs
creator_credit: Magpie Film Productions, Denham Wright and Edmund Marshal
brief_description: A dramatised documentary on the subject of drugs in modern society. Discusses some of the more important effects of cannabis, LSD, amphetamines, barbiturates, and, to a lesser extent, heroin. Intended as part of a teaching program for children aged 14-17 years.
